name: diagnosis
description: The label used by your cohort to specify the condition. Submit all instances of each diagnosis code, not just the earliest. May include: NA-ACCORD Standard Codes for AIDS-defining illnesses (ADIs), ICD-9 codes, ICD-10 codes, or ad-hoc diagnosis codes. DO NOT send rule-out diagnoses.
example: PCP, MAC, 112, I21.01, Hypertension, Diabetes Type 2

name: diagnosisDate
description: Diagnosis date of the condition. Apply date rules in Section 2.5 for fuzzy or unknown dates.

name: source
description: Source of diagnosis. Use Section 2.6 to define source of diagnosis.
